content.rendered:
About Us

Our Company is made up of a group of highly skilled and professionals.

0 +
Trusted Client
0
Completed Project
0
Profesionals
0
Years Experience

20 YEARS IN THE CHARCOAL BUSINESS

We are a leading manufacturer and exporter of 100% coconut shell charcoal briquettes, from Indonesia. We control every step of the manufacturing and quality control process of our briquettes, from coconut shell selection, cleaning and carbonization all the way through to final briquette, drying and packaging. Our production locations are situated in all the major coconut harvesting regions of Indonesia in Sumatra, Java and Sulawesi. 

Great TeamOur Team

We believe a great presentation evokes interest and drives business results far better than any saying can. Hence, We strive to be one of the best & biggest suppliers.

Introduce Charcoal Industries

We are well-known and high credibility coconut suppliers from Indonesia that provides a wide range of coconut product types at an affordable price and the best quality.

We will be happy to be your business partner and supplier, providing the best coconut products you can get. We are fully committed to our customers.

GALLERY Our Activities

You can see our gallery here, click to check out our collections. You can see our daily activity and products exported to many countries and regions worldwide.

  •
